channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump reveals Venezuela’s Maduro was captured in ‘fortress’-like house: ‘He got bum rushed so fast’
item.description: President Donald Trump revealed in a "Fox & Friends Weekend" interview that U.S. forces captured Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro in a "fortress"-like house...

item.title: US capture of Maduro throws spotlight on Venezuela’s massive oil reserves
item.description: Despite holding the world’s largest oil reserves, Venezuela’s oil industry has been hollowed out by economic collapse under President Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: Strange Days at the Modern Language Association
item.description: Sadly, the organization’s upcoming conference will further delegitimize the humanities.

item.title: What happens next in Venezuela? The regime’s foundation remains in place even after U.S. capture of Maduro, analyst says
item.description: "So removing Maduro did not necessarily change the fundamental equation of control."

item.title: Trump makes it clear shocking Venezuelan regime change is largely about oil: ‘They stole our oil … We’re going to make a lot of money’
item.description: Trump says American oil companies will rebuild the Venezuelan industry and take a "tremendous amount of wealth out of the ground."

item.title: Highs and Lows at Princeton’s New Art Museum
item.description: It looks great, but is the curatorial vision awry?

item.title: Cold, Confusion, and ‘Resistance’ Buttons: On the Ground at Mamdani’s Inauguration

item.title: JD Vance skips Trump’s Venezuela spotlight, but aide says he was ‘deeply involved’ behind the scenes

item.title: Rubio to Cuba: 'I'd be concerned' after US military arrests Venezuelan leader Maduro
item.description: A U.S. military operation captured Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro and wife, bringing them to face federal drug trafficking charges on American soil.

item.title: More than 150 U.S. military aircraft were used in the operation to capture Venezuela’s Maduro, including stealth fighters and bombers

item.title: It’s Not Just Minnesota. The Vast Majority Of Daycare Is A Scam
